makeCrack(Point2D, Brick.ImpactDirection, Shape) - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.entities.Crack
This method locate the bounds and the impact position of the brick, then it calls the helper methods in the crack class to draw the cracks based on the direction of the impact from the ball.

Movable - Interface in brickdestroyer.model.entities
This interface is to ensure all movable entities will have the behavior of moving in the game of Brick Destroyer.

move() - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.entities.Player
Move and update the player coordinate to the new x and y position in the game window with the constraint of not going out of the defined min/max value in the game window.
